LanguageData.VFEM2_HemogenDraught.label: hemogen draught
LanguageData.VFEM2_HemogenDraught.description: A rich, crimson liquid crafted from concentrated hemogen packs. When the user drinks it, it enhances all traits and abilities tied to their hemogenic nature, boosting physical and mental capacities. Additionally, this draught replenishes the user's hemogen supply over time, maintaining their vitality and enhancing their overall function.
